Quina
boardgame.description: Pente is an abstract strategy game. Players place glass markers on intersections of a 19-by-19 grid (the same as in Go). The object of the game is to get five of your own markers in a row (4 with more than 2 players) or capture five pairs of your opponent's pieces. The first to do either wins. Capturing takes place when exactly two pieces are sandwiched between pieces of the opposite color. There are multiple variations of the game for greater challenge and complexity. The 20th anniversary edition is a deluxe version of the game with a large color game instruction book, quality game board, and six sets of different colored glass markers that allows play with up to 6 players._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Other five-in-a-row games include Go-Moku and Renju (which do not feature capturing), and Ninuki-Renju (which does)._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Similar to:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; 5ive Straight_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Take 5_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; 5 in a Row_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Go-Moku_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Renju_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

listing.notes: Flat box Parker Brothers edition, two-player. It uses plastic chips for pieces and has a large ad on the box top proclaiming that you could get this copy for free if you bought certain other Parker Brothers games. This copy is new and shrinkwrapped. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m including a book on Pente Strategy with this item.

Pente Decipher 1992 Tube edition Complete, components in excellent condition. It_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s still mostly shrinkwrapped, but the shrinkwrap is torn at one end, so I popped it open. It_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s got the thick roll-up board, two bags of glass stones (yellow and green, still sealed), rule book, two felt bags for storing the stones. Tube is in excellent shape. (6)

This is the Decipher English edition in a red tube. The game comes with 2 sets of glass stones. I have added 4 more sets so that 6 players can play the game. The red tube has some scratches and shows shelf wear, but the board looks like new. The game was only played a few times. Comes from a smoke-free home.

Red Tube (1982; 5th edition). Game is in very good condition and has been verified as complete with 40 green and 40 yellow stones plus the original instructions. One string from the green pouch has come out but you can still close the pouch with the other string. Tube does have some scuffing but overall the tube is in good condition and the endcap is present
